attributes.action: raise the age for purchasing alcohol to 21, remove alcopops and buckfast from shelves, and fine parents of children caught in possesion of these
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in an effort to tackle youth crime, and to tackle the "yob" culture of binge drinking, we the undersigned believe that it would be easier for retailers to tell if someone is 21 than 18,  and that alcopops are targeted towards young and perhaps underage drinkers, and that the cheap availability of so called tonic wine we feel contributes to crime and disorder. As a further measure to enforce this act, make the parents liable for the actions of their children and introduce fines for underage possesion.
